projects.title: Network Security Enhancement
projects.bodyText:
- Performed an analysis of all the IPv4 and IPv6 CIDR blocks falling under North Carolina State University's ASN
 -  Fetched all the data of the hosts under the ASN using censys.io
 - Analysed the network vulnerabilities using shodan, aggregated the top 10 most frequent vulnerabilities and mapped them with their severity scores. 
 - Reported the top 3 biggest threats to NCSU admin

projects.title: Expertiza LMS Platform
projects.bodyText:
- Reimplemented the courses and instructor section in the e-learning platform that manages studentâ€™s courses and grades for Professor Ed Geiringer, using TypeScript and Ruby on Rails.
 -  Key elements included a main page displaying course listings, administrative capabilities to manage courses and TAs, and various React components like Course Row, TA Management Modal, and Course Editor.
 - Incorporated design patterns like Composite, DRY, Provider, Observer, HOC, and Mediator. Testing scenarios involved Jest and Enzyme for features like listing courses, managing TAs, and UI validation.

projects.title: Expense Tracker Bot
projects.bodyText:
- Created a Telegram Bot to manage expenses using Python, Telegram API.
 -  Included functionalities such as spend analytics, and currency conversion to the user using Data Analysis techniques*.
 -  Interfaced the BOT with Discord and Slack using the respective APIs.
 Enabled automated deployment using Travis CI, achieved a code coverage of 90%

projects.title: Railway Ticketing System
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a Ruby on Rails-based Rail Ticketing System.
 - Implemented Admin, Passenger, Train, Ticket, Customer Review modules with user registration and ticket booking.
 - Leveaged Redis as the backend database and ensured security against unauthorized access and data manipulation. 
 Utilised Device library for user authentication.

projects.title: Secure Chat App
projects.bodyText:
- A web application that allows users to send texts in real time.
 - End to End encryption using **RSA** Algorithm.
 - Uses **Firebase** database to store texts.
 - Secured with **Fingerprint** lock.

projects.title: SentiScope
projects.bodyText:
- Engineered advanced Deep Learning models including LSTM, GRU, and CNNs to conduct sophisticated analysis of user emotions, tones, and moods in text, achieving remarkable accuracies of 95.2%, 90%, and 87.6% respectively**.
 - Leveraged K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) and clustering techniques to innovate text authorship identification, attaining an impressive accuracy of 80%.
 -  Integrated the deep learning modules into a Django app, which utilized Twitter API to analyze trends, as well as user emotions on twitter.

projects.title: Portfolio Optimization using Deep Learning
projects.bodyText:
- Trained deep-learning models to forecast asset prices on historical time series data
 - Attained Sharpe ratio of 0.26 & 91% accuracy with LSTM. Optimized portfolio forecasts using statistical models
 - Cross-examined Machine Learning models to validate the impact of predictions, published the research on IEEE

projects.title: Recruitment Platform
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a robust platform for candidates & employers using Django, with job search efficiency, and user engagement
 - Got an accuracy of 86% by implementing TF-IDF with Logistic Regression, thereby boosting job matching accuracy. 
 Utilized React to create a front end for the application to allow different scenes to interact

projects.title: Music Mood Classifier
projects.bodyText:
- Designed a music mood classifier that achieved an accuracy score of 0.82 by leveraging Multi-Class Neural Network
 -  Further performed an in-depth analysis of popular music trends.

projects.title: Sahayak-bot
projects.bodyText: - Simulated an automated bot with a robotic arm that can autonomously navigate around a room or warehouse and transport objects from one place to anothe
